sect1.title: Installing Util-linux-&util-linux-version;
sect1.screen: Estimated build time: 0.1 SBU Estimated required disk space: 8 MB

sect2.title: Installation of Util-linux
sect2.para: Util-linux doesn't use the freshly installed headers and libraries from the /tools directory. This is fixed by altering the configure script:

screen.userinput: cp configure configure.backup sed "s@/usr/include@/tools/include@g" configure.backup > configure

sect2.para: And, since you'll need only a couple of the utilities contained in this package, build just those:

screen.userinput: make -C mount mount umount make -C text-utils more make -C sys-utils arch
